body:
Was the Ultra 5 the sunray server? What images did you serve to the sunrays
to boot them over tftp/dhcp? 


> 
> Hi Damian.
> 
> SuSe has a Sparc version I previously been running on a Sun 
> Ultra 5 at 
> least. Worked fine, albeit a bit slow... ;)
> 
> //Anders
